item.description:
Join us for Stumpd Team Trivia at J.J's Sports Bar and Grill in Northborough. Trivia starts at 7:00pm. We will meet at 6:30pm to get a spot or two, or three. Join us for drinks, food and a fun time playing team trivia. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. Please don't hesitate to walk up to me and claim your spot on our (usually) award winning team(s) !

As a special note, this venue strictly enforces the 6 team member limits (the # of teams is how the Stumpd people are paid).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Patrick, who is hard to miss...
item.name: Stumpd Team Trivia at J.J's Sports Bar and Grill in Northborough
